titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to exchange certain national forest lands in the Targhee National Forest.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Agriculture Department, OMB.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered favorably reported H.R. 4028 in lieu of this measure.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 4/14/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture, notwithstanding certain land exchange requirements under specified Federal laws, to exchange certain lands within the Targhee National Forest, including lands located in Idaho and Wyoming. Requires any lands acquired by the Secretary as a result of the exchange authorized under this Act to become part of the adjacent National Forest. Directs the Secretary to carry out such exchange within nine months after the enactment of this Act.
